item.description: Learning Tree Family Day Care is having an Open House this Sunday, 9/18 from 11:00 am- 1:00 pm. Come see our childcare and what we will be learning this year! Bring your kids - we will have outside and inside activities. My goal is to provide safe, warm and loving home-style environment. Our home with airy, bright rooms and a large playground is on a quiet cul-de-sac, making it the perfect location for a small community-oriented program. If you are interested in learning more you can visit www.learningtreedaycare.org or give a call at (508) 405-1526. Thank so much for your interest and we hope to meet you soon!

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Russian Child Care Open House in Framingham, MA
